name: Aragorn
title: Heir of Isildur
description: Ranger of the North and King of Gondor.
bio: Aragorn, son of Arathorn, is the last descendant of Isildur. He wandered the wilds as a ranger before claiming his rightful throne in Gondor. A brave warrior and wise leader.

name: Galadriel
title: Lady of Lothlórien
description: Bearer of Nenya, wise and powerful elf.
bio: Galadriel is one of the oldest and most powerful Elves in Middle-earth. She rules Lothlórien with grace and foresight, and bears one of the Three Elven Rings.

name: Gandalf
title: Wizard of the Istari
description: Wielder of fire, guide of the Fellowship.
bio: Gandalf the Grey, later Gandalf the White, is a Maia spirit sent to aid Middle-earth. He is wise, kind, and powerful — a beacon of hope against the darkness.
